page.title: 18A day at the infant school
page.content: When I woke up yesterday morning I had a wash and went downstairs for break fast. I had raisins, then I brushed my teeth with toothpaste. I got out my coat and put it on then I put on my shoes then I got in the car and we went to school. When I got to school we had the register. Then we went for our assembly about the sower. I did creative, I drew a piece of wood. When I had finish I started to do my number when it was dinner I had sausage and yoghurt. I played with my sister. Then it was belltime I went back into the classroom and did my phonic writing. I was on blue box 1.It was playtime.When playtime was over we had the story of the 3 Musketeers. Mummy came to get me and Deborah at hometime. Grandma and Grandad came with us. We had our tea and went to bed.
